ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates using the BaseRenderableSeries.RolloverMarkerTemplate property and the RolloverModifier to add mouse-over feedback of data-points on multiple line series to the user
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates using the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#RolloverModifier.html']RolloverModifier[/url], part of the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#What%20is%20the%20ChartModifier%20API.html']ChartModifier API[/url], to add mouse-over feedback of data-points on time-series to the user.
An ItemsControl data-binds to a collection of [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.InspectSeriesModifierBase~SeriesData.html']RolloverModifier.SeriesData.SeriesInfo[/url] collection.
The [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SeriesInfo%20%E2%80%93%20the%20ViewModels%20for%20Tooltips%20and%20Legends.html']SeriesInfo is like a ViewModel[/url] for the data-point, and each SeriesInfo derived type contains:
- The X,Y values of the series under the cursor. - The series color. - The series name
This can be used to create Active legends which update values as the user moves the mouse. For more information, please see the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#RolloverModifier.html']Adding TimeSeries Tooltips with the RolloverModifier[/url] article.
